description: misc/dashboard/codereview: bump user-specific table limits to 100.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Think about making other active CLs use this limit too.
If you cut them at 50 then they'll only be able to show my active CLs
and not any others. :-)

Oh, and here's the first problem: golang-dev has been dropped. gobot
should move the old reviewer (if any) to the Cc line.

On Mon, Jul 30, 2012 at 2:08 PM, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> Oh, and here's the first problem: golang-dev has been dropped. gobot
> should move the old reviewer (if any) to the Cc line.

This is actually critical for gocodereview to work correctly, since it
finds out about CL changes by being subscribed to golang-dev. We
obviously don't want golang-dev dropped anyway, but there's now two
reasons.

On Mon, Jul 30, 2012 at 2:06 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Think about making other active CLs use this limit too.
> If you cut them at 50 then they'll only be able to show my active CLs
> and not any others. :-)

I thought about it, but rejected it. That list is sorted by date, and
we mostly don't care about old CLs that we aren't directly involved
in. If the CLs matter they will be discussed/pinged, at which point
they will bounce to the top again.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a05e223e155b ***

misc/dashboard/codereview: bump user-specific table limits to 100.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6457051
